// Max Level,Class list,Type,Exp for Lv 1,2,3,...,200

// Type:
//	0 = Base Exp, 1 = Job Exp

// Base - 4th Jobs / Expanded Jobs (Trait) - Values for level 1 - 200 are unused and are simply copy-pasted from 3rd classes values.
